details.speaker: Customer
details.text: I ordered an iPhone 14 from Amazon, but it has not been delivered yet.

details.speaker: Agent
details.text: I’m really sorry for the inconvenience. I understand your concern and I’ll help you resolve this issue as soon as possible.

details.speaker: Customer
details.text: I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S23 from Flipkart last week, but it still hasn’t arrived.

details.speaker: Agent
details.text: I’m really sorry for the delay. I completely understand your frustration and I’ll check the order status for you right away.

details.speaker: Customer
details.text: I want to return my iPhone 13 because it arrived damaged and I need a refund.

details.speaker: Agent
details.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I understand your concern and I will initiate the refund process immediately.
